channel.title: How do i change prices on items in shops?
channel.description: How do i change prices on items in shops? Like in my PK shop an obby maul is 4m...

item.title: How do i change prices on items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

The first number: Low alch
The middle number: Store price
The third number: High alch

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change prices on items in shops?

item.title: How do i change prices on items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Go into you item.cfg
search for the item you want to change the value of
something like this should come up

item = 13642	Statius_full_helm	P	1500000000	1500000000	1500000000	3	3	4	-6	-2	65	70	63	-1	71	3	0

change the first three numbers to the price you want it to be for me its

1500000000	1500000000	1500000000

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change prices on items in shops?

item.title: How do i change prices on items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

For mine the first and third numbers are the low and high alch values and the second one is the store value.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change prices on items in shops?

item.title: How do i change prices on items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Go into item.cfg and search the item code for the item you want to change you will see the item id then the item name then the discription then the first 3 numbers are the prices. I myself forget what number is for which so i will let you figute that out

Read full topic
